# Use the Palmer Penguins dataset to predict species

## Load libraries

```{r}
# Load libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(parsnip)
```

## Model fit
```{r}
model <- rand_forest(mode = "classification") |>
  set_engine("ranger") |>
  set_mode("classification") |>
  fit(species ~ ., data = penguins)
```

## Model summary
```{r}
model
```

## Save the model object
```{r}
# save the model as rds
saveRDS(model, "model.rds")
```
